关于 Koodo Reader 您可能关心的东西: What you should know about Koodo Reader?
Koodo Reader 诞生于2020年春，因为新冠病毒的爆发，学校停课，开发: Koodo Reader was born in 2020 spring during the outbreak of COVID-19.
对于 Mac，Koodo Reader 要求及以上系统，对于 Windows，要: For Mac, Koodo Reader requires macOS 10.10 or later. For Windows, Windows 7 and later are supported.
如何备份和恢复数据？: How to backup and restore data?
点击右上角的 “备份和恢复” 按钮按照提示一步步操作就可以了，备份的文件以 zi: To backup and restore data, just click the Backup and Restore button in the top-right corner and follow the instruction
对于问题咨询，功能改进和 bug 反馈请前往客户支持页面，您也可以直接通过邮箱的: For general inquiries, suggesting new features and improvements, or to report bugs, visit the support page.
每个版本 Koodo Reader 的更新日志: What's new about each version of Koodo Reader
几十种语言即时在线翻译: Koodo Reader works great on all mainstream platform
从上千本书中快速搜索到你寻找的图书: Lightning fast seach inside thousands of books at once.
一键将你喜欢的文字添加到书摘中永久保存: Easily save any sentences into digests with one click
使用书签快速定位到之前的位置: Use bookmarks to flag your reading progress
使用笔记随时记录所思所想: Never let good idea slip away
完美支持触控的的各种手势操作: Use gestures to smoothen your reading experince
给笔记和书摘添加标签，方便归纳整理: caterize your notes and digests with tags
阅读器将永久免费并不断添加更多功能: Koodo Reader will always be free to use, with frequent updates.
使用听书功能来解放双手，自动翻页阅读: Use Text-to-speech function to free your hands
Koodo Reader 支持阅读 epub、pdf、mobi、txt 格式的电: Koodo Reader can help you read Epub, PDF, Mobi, TXT files
Koodo Reader 支持 Windows、macOS、Linux 和 网页: Koodo Reader runs on Windows, macOS, Linux, Web
使用您喜欢的网盘同步您的数据或保存到本地存储: Sync your data  with Dropbox, OneDrive and more.
